event.title: FSFE Berlin group meets in Berlin, Germany

body.p: The FSFE local group Berlin is having its regular monthly meeting. Anyone interested in software freedom is welcome. The meeting is in German, the participation is at no cost. 17:00-19:00 at E-LOK in Laskerstra√üe 4-6, not far from Ostkreuz station, 10245 Berlin. Bring good vibes with you.
